title: Software Engineering Intern - Freshman/Sophomore
text: We are looking for freshman and sophomore students interested in software development. This is our early talent program designed for first-year and second-year students. You will work on Python and JavaScript projects.

title: Product Management Discovery Intern
text: Our Discovery Program is designed for underclassmen who want to explore product management. This pre-internship experience is perfect for first-year students interested in building user-facing products.

title: Sophomore Consulting Explore Program
text: The Explore Program offers sophomore students a chance to experience management consulting. This is specifically for second-year undergraduate students interested in strategy.

title: Investment Banking Early Insight Program
text: Early Insights is designed for freshman and sophomore students interested in investment banking and capital markets. Learn about M&A, valuations, and financial modeling.

title: Software Engineering Intern
text: Looking for Class of 2027 students for our summer internship program. This is a software engineering role for juniors.

title: Product Manager Intern
text: Ideal candidates are graduating in 2028. We want seniors for this product management position.

title: Consulting Intern - Junior/Senior
text: This internship is for junior and senior undergraduates only. Penultimate year students preferred.

title: Investment Banking Summer Analyst
text: For rising seniors and final-year students interested in investment banking.

title: Software Engineering Intern
text: Looking for engineering interns to work on our platform. Strong Python and Java skills required. 10-week summer program.

title: Freshman Software Intern
text: Great opportunity for freshman students interested in software engineering.

title: Sophomore PM Intern
text: Looking for sophomore students for our product team.

title: Marketing Intern - Freshmen Welcome
text: Freshman and sophomore marketing students wanted for social media management.
